document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Iranian Ground Beetles (Coleoptera; Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Amara ( Zezea ) chaudoiri incognita Fassati, 1946 Citations
: Without exact locality (
Gueorguiev, 1995
).
Studied material: Khirood forest, 2012 (Prov. of Mazandaran).

persica
Chaudoir, 1842
Studied material: ( ZMTU ): Najmabad, 1170 m , 2012 (Prov. of Tehran). Citations: Without exact locality (Hieke & Wrase, 1988 ).
Studied material: Gorgan C., Prov. of Golestan.
Studied material: Khirood forest, 2012 (Prov. of Mazandaran); ( ZMTU ): Chadegan, 2012 (Prov. of Chahar Mahal va Bakhtiari).

= transcaspia Brancsik 1900
Citations: 22 km South east of Kerman (Prov. of Kerman; Hieke, 1988 ); Province Khorasan (Hieke, 1988 ).

Amara ( Paracelia ) saxicola indica (Putzeys, 1866 ) Studied
material: ( ZMTU ): Persepolis, 2012 (Prov. of Fars ). Citations:
New record for Iran .
Studied material: Damavand Mt. Gosfand Sara (Prov. of Tehran), 15 km east of Baladeh (Prov. of Mazandaran), Quamsar, 2070 m (Prov. of Esfahan).
Citations: Elburz Mts. R, SoleymanKuh- Massivs, 3700 - 3800 m (prov. of Mazandaran; Morvan, 1975 ).
Citations: Elburz Mts. R, Suttakuh-Massivs, Elika, 3800 m (prov. of Mazandaran; Morvan, 1975 ).
